content:
This outfit of mine has a special name,
It's called "Because I Feel Like It"!
I don't care how many holes it has, that's how I like it, bhan!
info: 闲聊-对自己服装的评价-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
I like clothes that can keep up with the wind.
Otherwise, what would I do when I dash around
and my clothes can't keep up with me?
info: 闲聊-对自己服装的评价-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
And who's gonna give me advice on "coordinating dresses,"
Saying I should try a more ladylike style,
As long as I keep my mouth shut.
info: 闲聊-对自己服装的评价-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
Stop joking around,{短暂停}
What kind of magical clothes could ever make me shut up?
info: 闲聊-对自己服装的评价-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊
